job.title: Site Reliability Engineer II
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description:
The Azure Edge + Platform Engineering System (AE+P ES) organization is responsible for running one of the largest scale engineering systems in the industry. Our services support the secure development and release of some of the most widely used products in the world.
The Artifact Services (AS) Team is responsible for managing storage, access, and retention of content produced in AE+P ES through large scale, highly reliable services. These services bridge the gap between producers and consumers of content, and are responsible for managing the content for its lifecycle. We are a diverse, agile team focused on delivering quality cloud based, scalable solutions in a thoughtful and flexible way. Come work on modernizing one of the largest scale engineering systems in the industry!
Responsibilities
This position is for someone that:
Is interested in improving critical development and release scenarios
Wants to work on a highly collaborative, diverse, and agile team focused on delivering reliable cloud based, scalable solutions
Wants to work in a thoughtful and flexible environment that is constantly adapting to better enable effective delivery
Qualifications
Required Qualifications:
Proficiency in compiled languages such as C#, C++, or Java and scripting languages such as PowerShell, Python, or Bash
Familiarity with both cloud infrastructure such as Azure or AWS, and bare-metal hardware infrastructure
Familiarity with telemetry systems and querying languages such as Azure or AWS Data Lake, Azure Data Explorer, Apache Spark, or Splunk
Familiarity with debugging OS and hardware issues
Solid design and coding skills
BS or MS in computer science, related degree, or equivalent experience
Preferred Qualifications
4+ years of hands-on experience developing and managing services in a development, operations, and site reliability engineering role
Ability to both lead and collaborate within and across teams effectively
Experience creating, developing, delivering, deploying, and maintaining online services, especially architectures at scale
Experience with using telemetry to understand customer usage patterns as well as to diagnose and drive improvements to production services
Experience with debugging OS and hardware issues to diagnose and drive solutions to issues impacting production services
